org.jdrupes

Class ClassChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdrupes.ClassChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channel, org.jdrupes.internal.Matchable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Handler.NO_CHANNEL

    public class ClassChannel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Channel
    The root base class for channels that use their class (type) as key for matching channels with handlers.
    Author:
    mnl
